channel.title: H.E.V. Mark 4
channel.description: Welcome to the H.E.V. Mark 4 ... ;D [url]https://img522.imageshack.us/img522/1738/hev.png[/url] [url]https://img14.imageshack.us/img14/7951/bms.png[/url] [url]https://img329.imageshack.us/img329/2320/randomcam.png[/url] [url]https://img522.imageshack.us/img522/2412/backgfe.png[/url] [url]https://img40.imageshack.us/img40/6281/gordonbms.png[/url] Have a very safe day... P.s i sitll have much work on this. :smiley: Like most of the details and most of the textures.And i have to lower the poly count :smiley: ... Tell me what u think ;P ?

item.title: H.E.V. Mark 4
item.dc:creator: FreemanBG
item.description:
johnyo:

^^^ awesome. The only significant differences I can see atm are the chin and the forehead.

Thanks,i will fix the problems tonight.
Also…thanks to Eric Fong for the update.

item.title: H.E.V. Mark 4
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
Aquila:

Pretty nice model,a lot better than the other HEV suits that pop up on Garry’s mod :fffuuu:

I will say that the hips remind me of Isaac’s RIG, but then again, the RIG is pretty much a rip of HEV. Keep up the goodwork, and don’t pay attention to the tards who dis it.

I don’t think RIG is rip of HEV, they both don’t share anything same.

item.title: H.E.V. Mark 4
item.dc:creator: Crikulus
item.description:
Yeah, now that I look at the big version of the picture, it really isn’t high-res, but Bolteh, your first comment really wasn’t very nice, and you did come across as an asshole. Next time use constructive criticism and tell him nicely that the photo isn’t properly high-res, instead of making a fuss. So, I think the model is just magnificent, but the wallpaper can be improved.

EDIT: Actually your first comment wasn’t that bad, but you got impatient fast. (ex. “/facepalm”) He just didn’t understand what you meant at the beginning.

Read full topic

item.title: H.E.V. Mark 4
item.dc:creator: FreemanBG
item.description:
Bolteh:

What?

Someone asks for a hi-res picture. You post a something that is just a low-res picture resized, pasted on a concrete texture, some random bits of smoke and a few “lasers”. That isn’t hi-res, that’s lo-res resized and put on a few layers of stick-textures.

Yes, the model is nicely made, but the wallpaper isn’t. You obviously have the skills to make a model, but not the skills to present it.

Also, if you’re going to call everyone who disagrees with you an asshole, you’ll end up with quite a long list of assholes in a few years. Not everything you do turns to gold, even if your mum tells you it is.

Agreezle.I’m kinda pissed right now.Let’s just end this silly agrument.
I’m not expecting everyone to like the wallpeper,it really is not enything special(i posted the picture to keep the thread alive). I’m sorry for calling you an “ass” I guess it was because i was in the edge at that moment(…family issues),and the comment was the last thing i needed.
Also,i don’t think that everything i made is “GOLD”. Please criticize the model to get an improvement!

Read full topic

item.title: H.E.V. Mark 4
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
What?

Someone asks for a hi-res picture. You post a something that is just a low-res picture resized, pasted on a concrete texture, some random bits of smoke and a few “lasers”. That isn’t hi-res, that’s lo-res resized and put on a few layers of stock-textures.

Yes, the model is nicely made, but the wallpaper isn’t. You obviously have the skills to make a model, but not the skills to present it.

Also, if you’re going to call everyone who disagrees with you an asshole, you’ll end up with quite a long list of assholes in a few years. Not everything you do turns to gold, even if your mum tells you it is.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: FreemanBG
item.description:
Bolteh:

/facepalm

Let me guess, his thread is the first time you saw the word “troll” pop up and now you’re bound on calling everyone a troll because they say something negative?

Um…then you are just being an asshole?

Bolteh:

And no, I don’t like the wallpaper…

That’s what i need to know.Get the fuck out,please…

Read full topic

item.title: H.E.V. Mark 4
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
/facepalm

Let me guess, his thread is the first time you saw the word “troll” pop up and now you’re bound on calling everyone a troll because they say something negative?

And no, I don’t like the wallpaper, but that has nothing to do with the fact that you have no idea what hi-res is. Hi-res applies to both quality and size of a picture, what you did is make a big picture with big height and width numbers, but the quality of the picture is as low-res as it can get, resulting in a huge picture full of blurred blobs and no detail at all.

Read full topic

item.title: H.E.V. Mark 4
item.dc:creator: FreemanBG
item.description:
Bolteh:

Hi-res ≠ bigger dimensions. That just looks like you took a 600*400 pixel document and quadrupled the dimensions.

Nice trolling!
So you don’t like the wallpaper ?

Read full topic
